nodes.text: This clone pilot participated in the Sky Battle of Quell and operated a Consular-class cruiser.

This pilot was part of Jedi Master Anakin Skywalker's rescue team to save master Aayla Secura and the remaining Clone troopers inside her flagship the Liberty. After evacuating the survivors, the pilot allowed Clone Commander CC-5052 to take his place in the ship's bridge and raise the deflector shields.
The ship was damaged when multiple Vulture droids fired at the ship. In the end, the ship cashed on Maridun. The pilot died in the crash.
